ferc_filing_data.tariff_title: Brookfield Power Piney & Deep Creek LLC Market-Based Rate Tariff

record_data.record_title: Brookfield Power Piney & Deep Creek LLC
record_data.record_narrative_name: Brookfield Power Piney & Deep Creek LLC Market-Based Rate Tariff
record_data.record_plain_text: BROOKFIELD POWER PINEY & DEEP CREEK LLC MARKET-BASED RATE TARIFF 1. Availability: Brookfield Power Piney & Deep Creek LLC (“Brookfield Power PDC”) makes electric energy and capacity available under this Tariff to any purchaser for resale, except as prohibited below. Brookfield Power PDC also makes available, to any purchaser, except as prohibited below, the ancillary services listed in this Paragraph 1: a. PJM: Brookfield Power PDC offers regulation and frequency response service, energy imbalance service, and operating reserve service (which includes spinning, 10-minute, and 30-minute reserves) for sale into the market administered by PJM Interconnection, L.L.C. (“PJM”) and, where the PJM Open Access Transmission Tariff permits, the self-supply of these services to purchasers for a bilateral sale that is used to satisfy the ancillary services requirements of the PJM Office of Interconnection. b. New York: Brookfield Power PDC offers regulation and frequency response service, and operating reserve service (which include 10-minute non-synchronous, 30-minute operating reserves, 10-minute spinning reserves, and 10-minute non-spinning reserves) for sale to purchasers in the market administered by the New York Independent System Operator, Inc. c. New England: Brookfield Power PDC offers regulation and frequency response service (automatic generator control), operating reserve service (which includes 10-minute spinning reserve, 10-minute non-spinning reserve, and 30-minute operating reserve service) to purchasers within the markets administered by the ISO New England, Inc. d. California: Brookfield Power PDC offers regulation service, spinning reserve service, and non-spinning reserve service to the California Independent System Operator Corporation (“CAISO”) and to others that are self-supplying ancillary services to the CAISO. e. MISO: Brookfield Power PDC offers regulation service and operating reserve service (which include 10-minute spinning reserve and 10-minute supplemental reserve) for sale to the Midcontinent Independent System Operator, Inc. (“MISO”) and to others that are self-supplying ancillary services to MISO. f. Ancillary Services - Third-Party Provider: Brookfield Power PDC offers Regulation and Frequency Response Service, Reactive Supply and Voltage Control Service, Energy and Generator Imbalance Service, Operating Reserve-Spinning, and Operating Reserve-Supplemental. Sales will not include the following: (1) sales to an RTO or an ISO, i.e., where that entity has no ability to self-supply ancillary services but instead depends on third parties; and (2) sales to a traditional, franchised public utility affiliated with the third-party supplier, or sales where the underlying transmission service is on the system of the public utility affiliated with the third-party supplier. Sales of Operating Reserve-Spinning and Operating Reserve-Supplemental will not include sales to a public utility that is purchasing ancillary services to satisfy its own open access transmission tariff requirements to offer ancillary services to its own customers, except where the Commission has granted authorization. Sales of Regulation and Frequency Response Service and Reactive Supply and Voltage Control Service will not include sales to a public utility that is purchasing ancillary services to satisfy its own open access transmission tariff requirements to offer ancillary services to its own customers, except at rates not to exceed the buying public utility transmission provider’s OATT rate for the same service or where the Commission has granted authorization. 2. Compliance with Commission Regulations: Brookfield Power PDC shall comply with the provisions of 18 C.F.R. Part 35, Subpart H, as applicable, and with any conditions the Commission imposes in its orders concerning seller’s market-based rate authority, including orders in which the Commission authorizes seller to engage in affiliate sales under this tariff or otherwise restricts or limits Brookfield Power PDC’s market-based rate authority. Failure to comply with the applicable provisions of 18 C.F.R. Part 35, Subpart H, and with any orders of the Commission concerning Brookfield Power PDC’s market-based rate authority, will constitute a violation of this tariff. 3. Limitations and Exemptions Regarding Market-Based Rate Authority: The Commission granted Brookfield Power PDC in Brascan Power Piney and Deep Creek LLC, Docket No. ER05-639-000, at 5 (April 21, 2005) (unpublished letter order) the following waivers and authorizations: (1) waiver of 18 C.F.R. Subparts B and C of Part 35 of the Commission’s regulations requiring the filing of cost-of-service information (except for §§ 35.12(a), 35.13(b), 35.15 and 35.16); (2) the requirements of 18 C.F.R. Parts 41, 101, and 141 regarding accounting and record keeping requirements (except for §§ 141.14 and 141.15); and (3) blanket authorization under Section 204 of the Federal Power Act and 18 C.F.R. Part 34 for any future securities or debt issuances by Brookfield Power PDC. 4. Applicability: This Tariff is applicable to all sales of energy, capacity, and the ancillary services specified herein by Brookfield Power PDC, which are (a) subject to the jurisdiction of the Commission, and (b) not made pursuant to another rate schedule on file with the Commission. 5. Rates: All sales shall be made at rates established by agreement between Brookfield Power PDC and the purchaser. 6. Other Terms and Conditions: All other terms and conditions shall be established by agreement between Brookfield Power PDC and the purchaser. 7. Seller Category: Brookfield Power PDC is a Category 2 seller in the Northeast region and is a Category 1 seller in all other regions, as defined in 18 C.F.R. 35.36(a). 8. Effective Date: This Tariff is effective upon the date specified by the Commission.
record_data.filing_title: Brookfield Power Piney & Deep Creek LLC MBR Filing
